## Row 1

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
ggplot(starwars, aes(mass, height)) +
  geom_point()
```

## Row 2

```{r}
ggplot(starwars, aes(name, height)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity")
```

```{r}
starwars <- starwars %>% 
  select(name, height, mass, gender, homeworld, species)

knitr::kable(starwars)
```
